item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:58 Chances: The stock has been on fire thanks to increasing demand for artificial intelligence (AI). There’s probably much more where that came from. Palantir is emerging as a leader in AI, but has the company built a real moat? Palantir’s huge government contract win has plenty of positive implications for shareholders.
